1.title: Ice, Ice, and More Ice
1.plot: Captain Paul Tiller takes his crew to a new fishing spot that is further out to sea than they have ever ventured.

2.title: Jeepers Creepers
2.plot: Morris Anstey gambles to change his crab-fishing luck, but could leave the Sebastian Sails worse off.

3.title: Go with your Gut
3.plot: Just a few miles off the coast of Newfoundland, Paul Tiller and the crew of the Atlantic Bandit are fighting it out for capelin.

4.title: Screwed in a Big Way
4.plot: Skipper Morris Anstey is breaking into a new fishery - turbot. It's a tough fish to catch, however the profits can be huge.

5.title: King of the Turbot
5.plot: The men of the Crewshell Chill are getting in on the ground floor of a brand new fishery - sea cucumbers. But getting into the game wasn't cheap.

6.title: Holy Mackerel!
6.plot: Off the coast of Prince Edward Island, Rick Crane has stepped out of the captain's chair to take a job as a deckhand on a tuna boat. He's never fished tuna before and this fishery has a steep learning curve.

7.title: One Man's Guts, Another Man's Gold
7.plot: Skipper Lee Pond and his crew of the Jacob Louisa are on the hunt for herring and the pressure is on. Lee needs a successful season to maintain his steep boat payments. But it isn't going to be easy.

8.title: Ever Seen Money Wiggle?
8.plot: Skipper Lee Pond and the crew of the Jacob Louisa are on the hunt for a final boatload of fish before the long winter. But success eludes them.

1.title: Go Hard, Go Fast
1.plot: Captain Richard Gillett risks his boat and crew to reach the rich crab grounds before his competition. Conway Caines runs into Murphy's Law, with everything from sharks to disappearing capelin setting them back. A rogue wave snaps Captain Paul Tiller's stabilizer in half and destroys his hopes for a strong start out of the gate.

2.title: Outwit, Outsmart, Outplay
2.plot: Richard's hunger forces him to take a gamble that puts his entire season and livelihood of his crew at risk. Paul has a friendly bet going with his "buddy boat". Skipper Justin Bridger struggles to find a balance between being the boss and maintaining friendships with his crew of childhood pals.

3.title: It Ain't Over 'Til It's Over
3.plot: An idealistic day of fishing takes a devastating turn for Richard when his tow skiff suddenly capsizes and becomes fully submerged under the boat. Broke and desperate, the urgency to bank a huge haul of capelin forces Conway into troubled waters. Paul's entire crew is put to the ultimate test when a sudden storm surrounds them in the middle of the ocean.

4.title: Passing the Torch
4.plot: Richard's capelin season is here, but with his 12-year-old son on board and struggling with seasickness, concentrating on work is no simple task. For the first time Conway skippers the Sea Doo while his father is out with a back injury. In an effort to be the first to the find the shrimp Justin takes his crew into dangerous weather, putting his entire season at risk.

5.title: Take It to the Limit
5.plot: Needing to make up for a terrible season, Richard has no choice but to rule with an iron fist in an effort to bring his crewmates home a paycheck. While hunting turbot, Conway's boat suffers severe damage and hangs by a thread. After a full on fistfight breaks out on the deck, Justin is forced to take drastic measures.

6.title: Holy Mackerel!
6.plot: It's the beginning of mackerel season and all our fishermen want a piece of the action. Richard hunts hard but his crew come up against one snafu after another. Conway races home to get his seining gear on board. Skipper Donald Spence has just bought a new boat, and he's under enormous pressure to make a big payday off the mackerel fishery.

7.title: Be Careful What You Wish For
7.plot: Fearful of losing his veteran crew, Richard has decided to take the biggest gamble of his career and head 200 nautical miles north to Labrador in search of mackerel. Desperate to find fish, Conway and his dad ignore a gale-force storm warning and finds themselves fighting for their lives. Justin's leadership is tested when a series of mechanical disasters puts his crew's lives in jeopardy.

8.title: Band of Brothers
8.plot: Donald races to Bonne Bay where reports of the biggest catches in memory are drawing in every boat in the region. Conway and his dad face off on how to hunt the herring. Rough seas knock out the autopilot and threaten to capsize Richard's boat.

9.title: Hell of a Lot of Herring
9.plot: Conway needs to survive a series of screw-ups and get some fish. Donald is out for mackerel to pay off his boat, but his rival Todd Young has the advantage of a fishing boat the size of a cruise ship. Richard's shorthanded crew will have to use every trick in the book if they hope to catch 100,000 pounds of herring.

10.title: What Goes Around Comes Around
10.plot: Herring hotshot Richard Gillett is determined to pay off his boat, but first he has to out-smart and out-fish the competition. Conway has a mega haul of mackerel in his sights. Todd gets a massive order for half a million pounds of mackerel, but the fish are nowhere in sight.

1.title: Ice Breaker
1.plot: A bad winter delays the fishing season, so Richard Gillett risks skipping crab to go for winter herring; Paul Tiller steams to the first crab strings of the season, while Conway and Rick set off to pull their first crab pots.

2.title: New Faces, New Problems
2.plot: Richard Gillett struggles to train a new skiff man; Conway's new guy is finally getting the hang of things; Paul's crew enjoys the best crabbing in years but discovers his buoys are in the wrong spot.

3.title: Growing Pains
3.plot: Richard Gillett and the Midnight Shadow crew prepare for capelin season; mechanical breakdowns on the Sea Doo mean Conway Caines and his father Rick have not caught any fish; it's turbot season for the Atlantic Bandit.

4.title: Fire at Sea
4.plot: Husband-and-wife team Andre and Michelle Jesso go after mackerel; Paul Tiller and the Atlantic Bandit crew gear up for their first seining trip in five years; Skipper Richard Gillett hopes for a monster catch of herring.

5.title: Pushing the Limits
5.plot: Morris Anstey battles rough seas as his crew fishes offshore for shrimp; the Seadoo battles mechanical problems while fishing for scallops; Rick Crane makes a road trip to inner Labrador, hoping to profit from the sale of his load of fish.

6.title: Close Calls
6.plot: Andre and Michelle abandon the search for mackerel in favour of herring; Morris navigates blind in dangerous fishing grounds; Rick Caines and crew are out fishing in their new boat.

7.title: Deep Sea Danger
7.plot: Skipper Paul Tiller and crew fish for urchin, diving 40 feet down to get to them; Morris Anstey continues a hot streak of fishing luck; Andre and Michelle Jesso still seek their first big catch.

8.title: Race Against Time
8.plot: It's late in the fishing season and Skipper Paul Tiller's crew find conditions increasingly difficult diving for urchin; Skipper Morris Anstey races to catch as much herring as possible before the fish plant closes.

1.title: 200 Miles from Nowhere
1.plot: Conway and his father risk fishing 220 miles off the north coast of Newfoundland; rookie skipper Rick Crane wants to prove he's as good as any fisherman; Morris Anstey's crew launches their crab season in Iceberg Alley.

2.title: Fight for What's Mine
2.plot: Six captains and their crews face mammoth swells and icebergs in the North Atlantic.

3.title: Old Dogs, New Tricks
3.plot: Six captains and their crews face mammoth swells and icebergs in the North Atlantic.

4.title: The Comeback
4.plot: Turbot fishing is more challenging than ever, testing Paul Tiller's crew; Captain Rick Crane has a greenhorn aboard the Crane's Legacy; the crew of the Midnight Shadow hunt for herring.

5.title: Man Overboard
5.plot: Morris Anstey battles rough seas as his crew fishes offshore for shrimp; the Seadoo battles mechanical problems while fishing for scallops; Rick Crane makes a road trip to inner Labrador, hoping to profit from the sale of his load of fish.

6.title: Keep Your Head in the Game
6.plot: Conway Caines and the crew of the Seadoo are behind on their herring quota; Richard Gillett tries to stay on track in his quest for two-million pounds of herring; Morris Anstey has greenhorn headaches.

7.title: Risky Business
7.plot: Morris Anstey deals with rookie problems on the Sebastian Sails; Richard Gillett and the crew of the Midnight Shadow race to catch their herring goal as mechanical failures threaten to end their season.

8.title: Guts and Glory
8.plot: Relive the most exciting moments of the past three seasons, as told by the Cold Water Captains.

imdb.plot outline: Cold Water Cowboys follows the action on fishing boats off the coast of Newfoundland through one intense fishing season. This salty brotherhood from Canada's most unique region faces swells as high as houses and icebergs the size of small cities as they fish for riches hundreds of miles offshore in the North Atlantic. It's a tough job-tough on boats, tough on gear, tough on the human body-but these bred-in-the-bone fishermen wouldn't have it any other way.
imdb.title: Cold Water Cowboys
plot: _Cold Water Cowboys_ (qv) follows the action on fishing boats off the coast of Newfoundland through one intense fishing season.::Paperny Entertainment

_Cold Water Cowboys_ (qv) follows the action on fishing boats off the coast of Newfoundland through one intense fishing season. This salty brotherhood from Canada's most unique region faces swells as high as houses and icebergs the size of small cities as they fish for riches hundreds of miles offshore in the North Atlantic. It's a tough job-tough on boats, tough on gear, tough on the human body-but these bred-in-the-bone fishermen wouldn't have it any other way.::Paperny Entertainment
